SEARCH
Package com.minesweeper.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.minesweeper.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class manages the game logic and user interactions for the Minesweeper game. It handles user inputs, updates the game state, and communicates with the view components.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new GameController with the specified game mode.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameMode gameMode)
      Constructs a new GameController with the specified game mode. Initializes the game, sets up the game frame, and displays it.
      Parameters:
      gameMode - the game mode to be used for the new game

  • Method Details

    • getGameMode

      public GameMode getGameMode()
      Returns the current game mode.
      Returns:
      the current game mode

    • getRows

      public int getRows()
      Returns the number of rows in the game grid.
      Returns:
      the number of rows

    • getColumns

      public int getColumns()
      Returns the number of columns in the game grid.
      Returns:
      the number of columns

    • handleRightClick

      public void handleRightClick(CellButton cellButton)
      Handles a right-click event on a cell button. Flags or unflags the cell and updates the flags remaining count.
      Parameters:
      cellButton - the cell button that was right-clicked

    • handleLeftClick

      public void handleLeftClick(CellButton cellButton)
      Handles a left-click event on a cell button. Reveals the cell and checks for game over conditions.
      Parameters:
      cellButton - the cell button that was left-clicked

    • showMainMenuFrame

      public void showMainMenuFrame()
      Displays the main menu frame and disposes of the current game frame.

    • flagCell

      public void flagCell(CellButton cellButton)
      Flags or unflags a cell button and updates the flags remaining count.
      Parameters:
      cellButton - the cell button to be flagged or unflagged

    • getFlagsRemaining

      public int getFlagsRemaining()
      Returns the number of flags remaining.
      Returns:
      the number of flags remaining

    • startNewGame

      public void startNewGame(GameMode gameMode)
      Starts a new game with the specified game mode and disposes of the current game frame.
      Parameters:
      gameMode - the game mode for the new game

    • solveGame

      public void solveGame()
      Solves the game using a CSP algorithm.

    • revealAllCells

      public void revealAllCells()
      Reveals all cells in the game grid. Mines are revealed with a mine icon, and other cells show their adjacent mine count.
